A common question that precoiners have is, "How do you know it's not too late to buy bitcoin now?"  They still assume Bitcoin follows the value/adoption curve of a pyramid scheme - a system that needs to sustain itself with new buyers and collapses if those ever run out.

The new financial system will be implemented by the decision-makers of this planet. Top-down, not bottom-up. Bitcoin was a good experiment but all its limitations were solved over 7 years ago by XRP... and the limitations have only been shown for a couple years. Think about that.
